markdownRemark.html:
A while back I asked if there was anybody doing a ColdFusion podcast. Hal Helms and Jeff Peters have a podcast covering FLiP, the Fusebox Lifecycle Process. I have seen Hal and Jeff speak at several different user group meetings and software conferences. They are both great speakers.

You can find there podcast at www.helmsandpeters.com.
